text: In which of the following cases the language used in the proceedings is not Vietnamese?

Respect the child's right to live with

text: What are the conditions for arbitration?

choices.A: The parties have an arbitration agreement, which can be made before or after a dispute occurs
choices.B: In case a party to the arbitration agreement being an individual dies or loses acting capacity, the arbitration agreement will still be valid for that person's heir or legal representative, unless otherwise agreed by the parties.
choices.C: In case one party to the arbitration agreement being an organization must terminate its operation, go bankrupt, dissolve, consolidate, merge, divide, separate or transform its organizational form, the agreement Arbitration is still valid for the organization receiving its rights and obligations, unless otherwise agreed by the parties.
choices.D: All three of the above options are correct

text: In arbitration, how can the parties negotiate and reconcile with each other?

choices.A: The parties have the right to freely negotiate and reach an agreement on the settlement of the dispute, but do not have the right to request the arbitration council to mediate so that the parties can reach an agreement on the settlement of the dispute.
choices.B: The parties have the right to freely negotiate and agree with each other on the settlement of the dispute or request the arbitration council to mediate so that the parties can reach an agreement on the settlement of the dispute.
choices.C: The parties do not have the right to freely negotiate and conciliate with each other but must request the arbitration council to mediate so that the parties can reach agreement on the settlement of the dispute
choices.D: The parties do not have the right to freely negotiate, conciliate as well as request the arbitration council to mediate for the parties to agree on the settlement of the dispute.

choices.C: 03 working days.
choices.D: 03 days including holidays and weekends.

choices.A: You are a minor

choices.B: Coconut tree

text: Which of the following is a part of the applicable law of dispute settlement specified in the Law on Commercial Arbitration?

choices.A: For disputes without foreign elements, the Arbitration Council shall apply Vietnamese law to settle the dispute.
choices.B: For a dispute involving a foreign element, the Arbitral Tribunal shall apply the law chosen by the parties; if the parties do not agree on the applicable law, the Arbitral Tribunal shall decide to apply the applicable law. law that the Arbitral Tribunal deems most appropriate
choices.C: In case the law of Vietnam or the law chosen by the parties do not have specific provisions related to the content of the dispute, the arbitration council may apply international practices to settle the dispute if the application or consequences of such application are not contrary to the fundamental principles of Vietnamese law.
choices.D: All three of the above options are correct

text: In what circumstances is the arbitration agreement invalid?

choices.A: Disputes arising in areas not falling under the jurisdiction of the Arbitrator specified in Article 2 of this Law.
choices.B: The arbitration agreement is not prohibited by law.
choices.C: The form of the arbitration agreement is consistent with the provisions of Article 16 of this Law.
choices.D: The person who establishes the arbitration agreement is a competent person as prescribed by law.

text: Is the arbitration agreement independent of the contract?

choices.A: The arbitration agreement is completely independent of the contract. The change, extension, cancellation of the contract, the invalid or unenforceable contract does not invalidate the arbitration agreement.
choices.B: The arbitration agreement is not completely independent of the contract. A change or extension of the contract invalidates the arbitration agreement.
choices.C: The arbitration agreement is not entirely independent of the contract. The cancellation of the contract or the invalid or unenforceable contract invalidates the arbitration agreement.
choices.D: The arbitration agreement is subject to the contract. Actions to change, extend, cancel the contract or the contract to be void or unenforceable will void the arbitration agreement.

text: What are psychotropic substances defined as?

choices.A: A psychotropic substance is a psychostimulant
choices.B: A psychotropic substance is a stimulant or psychoactive substance or hallucinogen that, if used repeatedly, can lead to addiction for the user.
choices.C: A psychotropic substance is a psychoactive substance
choices.D: All A, B, C are wrong

choices.C: All A, B, D are correct

text: According to the Law on Tourism on responsibility for state management of tourism, the People's Committees at all levels do not have the following duties and powers?

answer: Organize and coordinate dispute resolution activities by Regulatory Arbitration and assist Arbitrators in administrative, office and other support during arbitration proceedings.

answer: Citizens only need to present their ID card/CCCD, the competent authority will be able to look up the residence information in the national database system.
